title: What are some interesting potential benefits using Elon Musk’s Neuralink? - Quora

response.answer_text: People can read your mind! #ohwaitaminute - that’s a benefit? Really? Jokes apart - plenty. There are many people who have brain damage who would be tremendously benefited: vision impairments, hearing impairments for starters. If you can get access to the brain and stimulate the right parts in the right way, you can replace many of the sensory organs with electronics.
